QuestData.Title: Build Your Own Raft
QuestData.Description: <Jay looks off in the direction of Kea Krak.>$b$bHmm. They don't seem to be... calming down. We're going to have to try something different.$b$bYou'll need a raft. Go grab some wood planks and seaweed, and bring them over to me. I'll put something together for you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain 4 Spare Planks and some Tough Kelp.
QuestData.CompletionText: You got the stuff? I'll build your raft, I just need materials.
QuestData.RewardText: <Jay deftly weaves the planks together into a surprisingly seaworthy-looking vessel, then tosses them down into water below.>
